alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:33PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 415 PM MST... At 333 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Cutter, or 12 miles southeast of Globe, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Hayden, Christmas, San Carlos and Cutter. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 251 and 276. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 271. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 135 and 143, and between mile markers 146 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
